text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int A [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= k ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & A [ k ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( k = n - 2 ; k >= 0 ; k -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= k ; j ++ ) { if ( A [ k ] [ j ] + A [ k + 1 ] [ j ] > A [ k ] [ j ] + A [ k + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) { A [ k ] [ j ] += A [ k + 1 ] [ j ] ; } else { A [ k ] [ j ] += A [ k + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , A [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
